feed.title: Kamil Janeczek
feed.subtitle: Kamil Janeczek. Low code enthusiast, automation supporter, digital transformation consultant and skilled Pega developer holding LSA certification

entry.title: Home Assistant config
entry.content:
On Github repository I am shaing my configuration of HA whic includes:

Controling of devices and ligths via Shelly

Integration with Satel alarm system

Control of gas central heating via Sterowniki

Control of Gree air conditioners
entry.summary: On Github repository I am shaing my configuration of HA whic includes:

entry.title: Implementation Review
entry.content:
Implementation Review application helps Pega LSA to measure quality of team development. By automating this task appliacation makes it possible to run quality check frequently, in fully automated way, and gives instant feedback to development team about potential quality improvments.

Applicaiton produces also formal document that can be handed over to customer as part of governance efforts.

Checkout more about this project here: Github repository
entry.summary: Implementation Review application helps Pega LSA to measure quality of team development. By automating this task appliacation makes it possible to run quality check frequently, in fully automated way, and gives instant feedback to development team about potential quality improvments.

entry.title: Pega Cookbook
entry.content:
Pega Cookbook is an initiative to share Pega tribal knowledge. There are recipies and snippets used widly in Pega projects. Pega Cookbook aims at collecting them in out place.

Checkout more about this project here:github.com/kamiljaneczek/Pega-Cookbook all sources are available in repository Github repository
entry.summary: Pega Cookbook is an initiative to share Pega tribal knowledge. There are recipies and snippets used widly in Pega projects. Pega Cookbook aims at collecting them in out place.

entry.title: Newhire Checklist
entry.content:
New Hire Checklist application guides New hire during the first months with Pega platform. New hire will learn the basic knowledge required in each project. The checklist can also be used by already experienced employees to reevaluate their knowledge and discover potential gaps.

Checkout more on this project here: Github repository
entry.summary: New Hire Checklist application guides New hire during the first months with Pega platform. New hire will learn the basic knowledge required in each project. The checklist can also be used by already experienced employees to reevaluate their knowledge and discover potential gaps.

entry.title: Quality Checklist
entry.content:
Quality Checklist is an application initaily writen in Pega 8.1 and later upgraded to newest platform version. Main goal of this application is to improve quality of developemnt in Pega platform.

Application tracks formal documentation of quality measures taken after developing user story and before haning it over to testing. Applicaiton allows to configure Quality checklist form (per project) and customizes approval workflow (who needs to approve checklist).

Checkout more about this project here: Github repository
entry.summary: Quality Checklist is an application initaily writen in Pega 8.1 and later upgraded to newest platform version. Main goal of this application is to improve quality of developemnt in Pega platform.
